name: TestConnectPod-Lite
prepare_command:
NEW_FRAMEWORK_NAME="WebexConnectCoreSDK-Full"
OLD_FRAMEWORK_NAME="IMIconnectCoreSDK"
cd "${PODS_ROOT}" && find . -type f -name "*.sh" -print0 | xargs -0 sed -i "" -e "s/WebexConnectCoreSDK-Full.framework/IMIconnectCoreSDK.framework/g"
cd "${PODS_ROOT}" && find . -type f -name "*.xcconfig" -print0 | xargs -0 sed -i "" -e "s/-framework "WebexConnectCoreSDK-Full"/-framework "IMIconnectCoreSDK"/g"

script_phases.name: rename_framework
script_phases.script:
NEW_FRAMEWORK_NAME="WebexConnectCoreSDK-Full"
  OLD_FRAMEWORK_NAME="IMIconnectCoreSDK"
  cd "${PODS_ROOT}" && find . -type f -name "*.sh" -print0 | xargs -0 sed -i "" -e "s/${NEW_FRAMEWORK_NAME}.framework/${OLD_FRAMEWORK_NAME}.framework/g"
  cd "${PODS_ROOT}" && find . -type f -name "*.xcconfig" -print0 | xargs -0 sed -i "" -e "s/-framework \"${NEW_FRAMEWORK_NAME}\"/-framework \"${OLD_FRAMEWORK_NAME}\"/g"
